definition: Sa'gya town and county, Tibetan: Sa skya, in Shigatse prefecture, central Tibet/saga (i.e. heroic tale)
Sa'gya county, Tibetan: Sa skya rdzong, in Shigatse prefecture, Tibet

sentences.chinese: 于是给他起名叫以萨迦。

sentences.english: And over the host of the tribe of the children of Issachar was Nethaneel the son of Zuar.
sentences.chinese: 统领以萨迦支派军队的是苏押的儿子拿坦业。

sentences.english: Elizabeth is the wife of Zacharias.
sentences.chinese: 伊丽莎白是萨迦利亚的妻子。

sentences.english: Issachar is a strong ass couching down between two burdens
sentences.chinese: 以萨迦是个强壮的驴，卧在羊圈之中。

sentences.english: Of Issachar； Nethaneel the son of Zuar.
sentences.chinese: 属以萨迦的，有苏押的儿子拿坦业。

sentences.english: And the sons of Issachar; Tola, and Phuvah, and Job, and Shimron.
sentences.chinese: 以萨迦的儿子是陀拉，普瓦，约伯，伸仑。

sentences.english: The territory of Manasseh reached the sea and bordered Asher on the north and Issachar on the east.
sentences.chinese: 北边到亚设，东边到以萨迦。

sentences.english: Of the tribe of Issachar， Igal the son of Joseph.
sentences.chinese: 属以萨迦支派的有约色的儿子以迦。

sentences.english: Issachar is a strong donkey, crouching between the sheepfolds .
sentences.chinese: 以萨迦是个强壮的驴，卧在羊圈之中。

sentences.english: The fourth lot came out for Issachar, clan by clan.
sentences.chinese: 为以萨迦人，按着宗族，拈出第四阄。

sentences.english: And by the border of Issachar, from the east side unto the west side, Zebulun a portion.
sentences.chinese: 挨着以萨迦的地界，从东到西，是西布伦的一分。

sentences.english: And Issachar was true to Barak; Into the valley they were sent behind him.
sentences.chinese: 以萨迦以忠诚待巴拉，众人都跟随巴拉冲下山谷。

sentences.english: Paltiel son of Azzan, the leader from the tribe of Issachar;
sentences.chinese: 以萨迦支派有一个首领，阿散的儿子帕铁。

sentences.english: And by the border of Simeon, from the east side unto the west side, Issachar a portion.
sentences.chinese: 挨着西缅的地界，从东到西，是以萨迦的一分。

sentences.english: And on the limit of Simeon, from the east side to the west side: Issachar , one part.
sentences.chinese: 挨著西缅的地界，从东到西，是以萨迦的一分。

sentences.english: Issachar is a rawboned donkey lying down between two saddlebags.
sentences.chinese: 以萨迦是个强壮的驴，卧在羊圈之中。

definition: Hailun county level city in Suihua 綏化|绥化, Heilongjiang/Helen or Hélène (name)
Logue or Rogge (name)/Jacques Rogge, president of International Olympic Committee (IOC)
